item.title: The grass verge is in need of regular cutting, 7th September

item.title: A resident called to report that she saw a particular company dumping oil in a drain. She says she understand that this act is totally wrong and that the offender is committing a prohibited act that creates blockages, pollutes watercourses, and can lead to health and environmental problems.The resident says she has reported this act in the past. A particular company (residents of the area) regularly pour used oil into one of the drain. According to the customer, the perpetrator are at number 3 Merriam Avenue E9 5LS. They operate an event com, 7th September
item.description:
